name: TodoList B2C Example
description: Example to illustrate how to login into Azure AD B2C to obtain a token and consume a secured WebAPI
content_security_policy: script-src 'self' https://ajax.googleapis.com https://alcdn.msauth.net/ https://code.jquery.com/ https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://stackpath.bootstrapcdn.com/ https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com; object-src 'self'
